segments.text: The kitchen light highlights the everyday chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked neatly by the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the faucet's on, causing all this overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's ruining the cabinets, streaming down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman dries her plate with focus.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's unaware of the slippery floor beneath.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the boy balanced precariously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His reach into the cookie jar is daring.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool wobbles with every move.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If he falls, it could be serious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her excitement is kind of cute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet the risks make me uneasy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden remains untouched by this.
segments.speaker: PAR
